game.title: The Lost Scrolls
game.objective: Find and return three stolen scrolls from the Temple of Knowledge.
game.description: The scrolls hold vital knowledge for the world's survival. Complete the quest before they fall into the wrong hands.
game.reward: A powerful magical artifact to aid your journey.

task.objective: Travel to the Temple of Knowledge and inquire about the scrolls' theft.
task.description: The temple is in the east mountains. Speak with the monks for clues.

task.objective: Track down the bandits who stole the scrolls at their hideout.
task.description: The hideout is in the forest. Retrieve the scrolls carefully.

task.objective: Return the scrolls to Archmage Rieldir at the Tower of Mysteries.
task.description: Deliver the scrolls and expect his gratitude and reward.
